articles.author: Perry Stein
articles.title: Here is how Biden's covid restrictions compare to Europe's - The Washington Post
articles.description: Biden’s new coronavirus measures, like refunding fast tests and imposing travel quarantines, have been a pandemic standard in places like Germany, Britain and Belgium.
articles.content: Martin McKee, a professor of European public health at the London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine, said covid-19 measures arent politicized in most countries to the degree they are in the Uni… [+5900 chars]
